title: looking for people that are new and need friends
body: i have a club called krispy kreme stoners, just looking for others that are chill people ( from colorado/ california but don't have to be), if you want to join, just put your name in the comments and i'll add you up and invite.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
